name: .JPG-LARGE
summary: Learn about .JPG-LARGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open JPG-LARGE files with any image viewer or web browser that supports JPEG images. However, some applications may not recognize the .jpg-large file extension and will not open the JPG-LARGE file. If this is the case, change the file extension from .jpg-large to .jpg, then open the file.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .jpg-large file in Google Chrome 96
images.caption: JPG-LARGE file open in Google Chrome 96
